0: The hotel was recently renovated and looks fabulous
The staff gave us drinks at the bar while they got us a newly renovated room with a pool side view
Gardens Lobby and Pool Area Well located in a very nice neighborhood The rooms need complete restoration
The level of quality in services and mainteinance is the best of the best
The same hospitable service the lovely new remodeling and updated rooms the excellent location are hallmarks of the Embajador and greatly appreciated
This classic hotel from the mid190s has an older feel with updated features
The bedrooms had been updated and had huge closets and lovely bedrooms mine with a view of the ocean all with balconies overlooking the city
1: I normally stay in the city and the Hotel we normally occupy is under renovation
The lobby was really nice but it needed some repair and cleaning
It was obvious this hotel was very old and refurbished in a manner to maintain it is original character which I thought was cool
Hotel looks great with the renovations once the gym is completed it will be GREAT however the restaurant needs a better menu
This property is being renovated the rooms that is improving the stay even more
hotel is a nice business hotel gym is poor being remodeled staff needs a bit of training especially coordinating airport pick up
But the hotel itself has been modernized and remodeled over the years to keo it current
Most recently the gymnasium was redone and although it lacks a pull up bar it has very nice equipment as well as a new spa which I did not try
My room was spacious but the bathroom was in need of renovation so it is good that the hotel is renovating the property
I understand the hotel is undergoing a complete renovation
2: Despite renovations that are ongoing that make the outside look questionable
I am sure when is full renovated will be a full 5 stars no doubt
The hotel is old but the renovation restored it completely making it probably one of the best places to stay in Santo Domingo
They remodeled the hotel and made it worse for people that used to go there because of the Bakcomy Reception give horrible service
The hotel has gone through renovations and upgrades
I have stayed at this hotel for over 5 times since the last renovation and I must say that I love the hotel
I have been coming here for years and am just blown away at the remodel of the rooms
The lobby furniture can be updated
could not be happier to have found Luisana Flores as a night manager at one of the best hotels now even better with newly renovated rooms in Santo Domingo the Hotel Embajador
